title: LARGEST 550 + SQ FOOT Studio in elevator building w/. FREE HEAT
map_address: 540 West Briar Pl near NORTH BROADWAY
posting_body: Rent Includes:: Gas, Heat, Hot Water
- The largest studios in the 540 Briar building
- Over 550 sq feet w/ big open main room
- Vintage kitchen w/ lots of room that fit 4 top table
- Vintage bath w/ great water pressure
- This units gets tons of sun and has newer windows
All Units at 540 W. Briar are HEAT INCLUDED!
This charming vintage elevator mid rise building is in the heat of all things Lakeview!
Shopping, great restaurants, night life and lake activities all within a few short blocks.
540 W. Briar has an onsite staff, laundry room, bike storage & work out room.
Express bus around the corner & 5 / 10 minute walk to el.
ICM Properties Inc. is a professional management company since 1966.
